ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: Overall - this is really good news!  We can look forward to some fixes and some possible tuning :) and at least know that they are aware of other items. Woo
ygData.messageBody:
Overall - this is really good news! We can look forward to some "fixes" and
some possible tuning :) and at least know that they are aware of other
items. Woo hoo!

Sylly Songsynger

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 8:44 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied


From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>

Well, after 3 tries, I finally got a reply to the list of questions that we
put together to send to GZ. Don't know if all the answers are exactly what
I might have hoped to hear, but its nice to at least get some info.
